name: Fall Romance Eyeshadow Palette
about: What it is:A provocative blend of 12 decadent eyeshadows, including seductive, jewel-toned metallics and rich neutral shades..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Ranging from neutrals to vivid pops of color, these 12 full-pigment, easy-to-blend eyeshadows deliver high color payoff and buildable intensity..This Palette Contains:.Palette Size:3.09w x 0.81d x 7.33h (full size)

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use light pressure when picking up product with a brush or fingertip..-Pair with‚ÄØAnastasia Beverly Hills Eye Primer‚ÄØ(sold separately) to create an even, smooth canvas for vibrant payoff..-Use firm, dense brushes to deposit product and fluffy brushes to diffuse and blend..-Apply light shades to accentuate and highlight features. .-Apply medium shades to contour and transition color. .-Apply deeper shades to line and define.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Deceptively warm shades compared to the photo.  Formulation is beautiful as always.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it, not burn my eyes from it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own a handful of abh palettes and this is the only one I‚Äôve ever had a problem with. My eyelids felt and looked burned after using the matte shades so I ended up returning it. Was told it could be a reaction to whatever they used for those pigments but had really high hopes so that‚Äôs a bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I returned this because although the purple is gorgeous some of the earth tones are extremely muddy on my light olive skin even with primer underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful vibrant colors. I love this eyeshadow palette.

reviews.review_title: Thought it was boring...I was wrong! It's SO GOOD
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok... when this came out I didn't purchase it because it seemed somewhat boring. However, I picked it up after seeing it in Sephora and I haven't put it down since (which is saying a lot as I have MANY palettes to choose from). I've enjoyed it thus far because I can easily use it as an everyday palette and also have a nice pop of color without ending up with a look that isn't very wearable. The shimmers are VERY smooth and easy to work with, as I've been applying most of those with my finger, and the mattes have blended like a dream. As someone who isn't 20 anymore, it looks very good on my eyelids. This palette has surprised me bc I'll admit, I'd written it off, but I'm so glad I tried it bc I have zero regrets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for deeper skinned girlies - all the colors work!  I tend not to go for too heavy handed looks and actually  like to use the  mattes for one-and-done shadows with a light diffused touch for a natural smokey eye for daytime.  The purple and brown tones are just perfect! It lasts all day and blends beautifully. The shimmers are great to kick up a notch for night.  To note, the shimmers are a little dry compared to old abh formulations. That said they still perform great and last all day. Watch out for some fall out though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely beautiful!! if you have a dark skin tone buy this pallet.

reviews.review_title: Mattes are great, shimmers not so much.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of Anastasia products but this palette seems to have been formulated differently.  The shimmers give enormous fall out but don't last all day at all, the colour depth of them is also questionable.  Usually, palettes from Anastasia are amazing so they are an instant order but this makes me rethink that.  It was an expensive palette for not a great quality this time around.

reviews.review_title: So beautiful and so worth it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So beautiful and so worth it. I am not an expert with makeup, but the amount of compliments I get with how good my eyeshadow looks are is unreal. So pigmented, colors are amazing, blend so easily. Best purchase I've made recently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this palette from TRENDMOOD very lovely colors in this palette and ABH has great quality makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is so stunning! The shimmers are gorgeous and look amazing on my eyes. Perfect for fall.

reviews.review_title: Received in my TrendBox and Love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing palette with great shimmers. It was such an amazing price for the products I received in the box.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved the colors! The colors are very pigmented and a great palette for the fall! Love, love, love it! Received this palette in my Trendmood box and I can‚Äôt put it down!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful color story and the Doris very pigmented. You can create a lot of looks with this palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous fall palette in the same great ABH formula. I love the color story!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an absolutely perfect fall color story, but great for any time of course. The shades are just like all the shades of falling leaves as well as fall blooms. I'm in love with Crown, a bright gold to lime green duochrome jewel, as well as Divine, which is a divine shade of fuschia! The palette itself is a velvety plum-maroon and just gorgeous! So happy to have snagged this beauty in a Trendmood Box!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful pallet! Gorgeous color story and same great ABH quality! Love!

reviews.review_title: A fun addition to your collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this palette in a Trendmood box and am loving it!  I have quite a few ABH palettes and am never disappointed in their color story and quality.  I appreciate the fun pops of color and have no problem finding a way to use them on a regular basis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item in my Trendmood box and I was so excited to receive it! I love the colors and they really look amazing on my skin tone! This will become a go to palette to grab for the fall !

reviews.review_title: Essence of Autumn in a Palette
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was absolutely delighted to find the ABH Fall Romance Palette in my Trendmood Box, and let me tell you, it's a makeup lover's dream! The texture is unbelievably velvety, making the application a breeze, and the blendability is top-notch. But what really stole my heart are those sultry jewel-toned shades ‚Äì they scream sophistication! If you're a fan of the fall season, this palette is an absolute must-have. It's like capturing the essence of autumn in a compact. üçÇ

I have Modern Renaissance and the formula for Fall Romance is clearly superior. They are wearable dark and definitely fall colors. Way less fallout than previous palettes. It's very pigmented and reminds me of the Jackie Aina palette in the intensity of pigment.

The mattes blend well, the shimmers are smooth with almost zero fallout.  Colors are PERFECT for fall!

reviews.review_text: Beautiful palette, smooth and blendable formula. I got this in the Trendmood box and it was one of the products I was most excited to get. It‚Äôs perfectly for day to night makeup and a wonderful palette for travel

reviews.review_text: I have all of ABH and Norvina palettes and for the most part I‚Äôve enjoyed using them.  This pallet was just ‚Äúmeh‚Äù for me.  The color story isn‚Äôt so exciting but they blend out okay, just not an exceptional palette for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous palette!! Very pigmented and ABH never disappoints with her colors and formula. I got mine in my Trendmood box order and let me tell you it's worth every penny!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in my Trendmood Box and I'm really glad I got to try it. The colors are very pretty but some of the shades are hard to work with and leave alot of fallout. All the matte shades work great and blend out nice. I think it has perfect colors for fall but I don't think it's an everyday pallet and there's really only one transition if you want a light colored look, otherwise I feel this is best for making smokey/dark looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't been excited about an eyeshadow product in a long time. When I received this in my Trendmood volume 21 box and opened it, I literally couldn't stop looking at the colors. Absolutely stunning and gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color story, great for all seasons but esp Fall. Love the shimmers & mattes are great too!  *received in my Trendmood box

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this palette in a Trendmood box and I'm really enjoying it. The formula of ABH is great and the color story is very wearable. I like that it can really be used all year, IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors‚Ä¶ very grungy glam! Formula blends well. Received in Trendmood box

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are perfect for autumn... pigmented, and beautiful color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: blends like a dream. great for fall. not a must have though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this palette consistently since I got it.  It was a surprise how much I liked my looks.   It‚Äôs a great fall Palette

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette has many beautiful shades exactly for fall looks. I got it from my trendbox, and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colors and it‚Äôs so buttery and glides on the eyes nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this palette I received in my Trendmood Box! It is not too dark for my fair skin tone. Mattes blend well and I always use my finger for the shimmers. Super pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another Beautiful Palette from Anastasia Beverly Hills! Enjoying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love this palette. It‚Äôs the perfect date night palette for sexy sultry looks. I might try a dark Smokey eye too since I‚Äôve only experimented with the light colors.  I got this palette thanks to Trendmood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the romance pallette in my Trendmood box and absolutely love it! Great colors and pigment! I love ABH pallettes always has the best pigment with barley any fallout. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the colors very pigmented, blend nicely. Colors in for many looks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors for Fall!! Love this color story and as always, a good quality ABH formula. Definitely worth the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this palette. Beautiful fall colors üíú I received in my TRENDMOOD Box üíúüíúüíú

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It takes a little bit to work with you do have to blend more than usual but I love the pallet one of my everyday faves! You can go all out but also just do subtle eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this beauty in my Trendmood Box and I really like it. The colors are great for fall and it‚Äôs easy to put look‚Äôs together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the trendmood box and I can‚Äôt believe it was in there. Very pigmented. So pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know why everyone has been so hard on this palette. It's not for a newbie makeup user but it's not hard to blend. I love that the shimmers are more like a wet metal look and honestly it's one of my top palette choices for fall right now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colours and easy to apply. Happy with my purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette does not measure up to my other ABH palettes. The colors are not as pigmented and the texture of them is completely different. I‚Äôve had tons of issues with these shadows creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so sad to leave this review I normally love abh formula but this is BAD. I have med to high experience with makeup/techniques and this palette takes an enormous amount of blending and still only looks ‚Äúok‚Äù

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this when I first saw it, but when I bought it with my own money and tried with a primer I was not impressed. I also tried a brush and fingers- nope didn't help. I was looking forward to the shades Moonlight and Divine the most, but they are the hardest to work with, go figure. Moonlight was really just a lavender topper that was bone dry. I also found Smoke and Fireside to be more or less the same color on my skin. Had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The colors in this palette are STUNNING. This is a perfect, brown girl friendly color story. The only thing missing is one more matte shade that can be used as a transition color. This palette is perfect for the holidays and fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a terrible palette but there is so many better options. Majority of the shimmers need to be heavily layered. The mattes are good but the darker shades seem to look the same on the eye

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love playing with this palette. The color story is Beautiful! Therefore,  there‚Äôs more product as well! It‚Äôs pigmented! The texture is so silk also bÔøºlends seamlessly üíã‚ú®

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it and I was so disappointed, I‚Äôm a huge fan of ABH, I have 5 palettes, 6 with this one that I returned. The palette is chalky, it goes terribly on the eyes, patchy, hard. Don‚Äôt waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its gorgeous! Great for woc as well! I did a review on my tiktok. Some fall out but not much. Pigmented as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is absolutely beautiful! I love that there are duochrome eyeshadows in it, along with metallics and mattes. The mattes are powdery, but blend like a dream. I definitely recommend this palette!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful palette that is very pigmented. I love this palette so much! It is fun to experiment with and try colors I normally wouldn‚Äôt use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm really enjoying this palette!  The colors are perfect for a fall look. They are highly pigmented with minimal fall out and they wear very well all day long!  Lots of different ways to wear this and blend together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love every single color in this thing. I love all the textures in this thing. I love how it compliments my wardrobe. Truly, no complaints. It's the perfect companion to their Nouveau Palette, which I've also sung the praises of: it's a little grungier and richer, but retains a similar vibe. If you have an olive undertone, you may want to consider looking at this one! The online photos don't do it justice. (For example, Fireside isn't actually orange, and Crown has lovely olive green flecks, but it's more of a burnished gold base.) Until Fall Romance and Nouveau, I had entirely given up on mainstream eyeshadow palettes... I'm a slightly warm-leaning, neutral olive. (Light to light-medium in depth.) Something is definitely working for me, here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome autumnal colors, bendable and fun to wear. I love the assortment and I‚Äôm satisfied with the aesthetics.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Every brown girl should own this palette. Colors done right ü•∞

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The palette inside & out gorgeous finally a company got the fall greens right &  I know , fall is my favorite time of year this is perfect for light-medium , medium and dark complexions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical when I saw the color story but took a chance because I am a collector of ABH palettes. The shades are great to blend, minimal fallout and the shimmers are vibrant. A few of the matte shades have shimmer in them so they make fantastic lid shades and again I was impressed with the creamy formula and the way the shadows were perfectly pressed. Now this palette will need to be partnered with another palette in case you enjoy more transition shades to go with these shadows. However the quality and richness is there for this product and I do recommend trying it for yourself.

reviews.review_title: I was able to make this work. and I like it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure why all the bad reviews are everywhere on sephora and YouTube. But this palette was great! The mattes blended out just fine, and the shimmers applied ok with a finger or wet brush. (If you try to use it with a dry brush, then yeah, it doesn't work well.)Hence, the 4 star review... The color story is super pretty, and you can do a bunch of cute looks with this. I do find that her other palettes are better quality, but that's not to say this palette is bad. Overall, I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm loving this pallet. It is divine!! It‚Äôs hands down my 2nd favorite pallet #1 is also an Anastasia palette. There colors blend perfectly.

First of all, ppl are CRAZY! This is a phenomenal palette! Perhaps those giving it low stars just don‚Äôt know how to use eyeshadow, especially ABH. There‚Äôs definitely a little bit of a learning curve to it. I cannot get enough of this palette! I‚Äôve been using it daily since I got it! There are so many combinations!! Just play with it a while before giving it a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A dreamy fall palette with bold color payoff. ABH really keeps knocking it out of the park with their new palettes and updated shadow formulas. Primrose, Nouveau, Rose Metals, Cosmic, and now Fall Romance - I recommend them all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with dark skin, it is very hard to find a palette where every color is usable. (Modern Renaissance is gorgeous, but i can only use 4 colors.) Every color shows up on me and is not ashy looking. Lost a point for the formula not being up to ABH standards, but I still find it totally usable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this one to pair with the other ABH palettes, I feel the formula here should be easier picked up with a dense brush and packed on because the mattes are more like a pressed pigment.   Similar to JStar eye shadows.  I think ppl are confused on how to use a pressed pigment formula.  Using your finger helps for the shimmers and a really good base.  The mattes are like a pressed pigment not eyeshadow so maybe ABH used a different pigment formula than prior.  I will take off 1 star for the shimmer fall out.  But it's a nice palette, you just can't use a fluffy brush.  You want a dense brush with this for it to work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful palette . Before applying , I prime my eyes with my concealer or Mac paint pot . No issues with chalkiness , patchiness , colors not performing or shimmers / metallics being hard , & Divine did not stain

reviews.review_title: My favorite fall palette so far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are stunning. I love it paired with the Rose Metals palette too. I‚Äôve done several looks with it so far. I can see how the mattes might be patchy for people, especially if you have dry skin. I‚Äôve found it works with my UD primer potion fine. Definitely gonna be my go to Fall palette üñ§

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this pallet solely for the color divine. I do not have any shade like this in my collection. In person Divine looks nothing like it does in the photos. It is a deep, dark purple hue with little shimmer or glitter. The bright, shimmery,  pink in the photos is not what you will receive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointing. The mattes are patchy and hard to build. The shimmers are dry and crumble.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about this palette, it speaks to my desired color story. Unfortunately it didn‚Äôt perform well. The mattes are streaky. The shimmers are hard & not creamy which was a surprise.

reviews.review_title: Formula is a little off with this one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs not a bad palette, but the shimmers are more hard pressed then they are in the other recent ABH palettes. Moonlight is already getting a little bit of hard pan. The mattes blend well.
